key: This is my first time seeing one.
original: This is my first time seeing one.

key: Wow! This place looks like a cabin with a field over there...
original: Wow! This place looks like a cabin with a field over there...
translation: 哇哦！看起来这儿有个小木屋，还有块田……

key: You came back a little earlier than usual, \C[5]Maleena\c[0].
original: You came back a little earlier than usual, \C[5]Maleena\c[0].
translation: 你回来的有点早，\C[5]玛丽娜\c[0]

key: Who is this little one? Is he your new friend?
original: Who is this little one? Is he your new friend?
translation: 这个小家伙是谁？你的新朋友？

key: I was jumping off a tree and...
original: I was jumping off a tree and...

key: landed my foot... on his face...
original: landed my foot... on his face...

key: I brought him here because I was worried that he would get any injuries.
original: I brought him here because I was worried that he would get any injuries.
translation: 我担心他可能受伤了，所以把他带过来

key: Can you check on him for me?
original: Can you check on him for me?
translation: 你能检查下他有没有受伤吗？

key: There are a few small scratches on the face.
original: There are a few small scratches on the face.

key: This is my homemade medicine with natural herbs.
original: This is my homemade medicine with natural herbs.
translation: 这是我用天然药草自制的疗伤药

key: It will heal scratches on your face.
original: It will heal scratches on your face.
translation: 应该能治好你脸上的擦伤

key: How did you do that, kid?
original: How did you do that, kid?

key: I felt a sudden gust of wind slap my face and my body immediately pulled back on its own.
original: I felt a sudden gust of wind slap my face and my body immediately pulled back on its own.
translation: 我感觉一阵风往脸上扇来，然后我身体就自己往后退了

key: If you master it, you will be as slippery as a fish.
original: If you master it, you will be as slippery as a fish.
translation: 如果你能熟练掌控的话，你就能变得像鱼一样滑溜

key: No one can land a punch on you.
original: No one can land a punch on you.

key: Why are you touching my arms and legs?
original: Why are you touching my arms and legs?

key: I'm just doing some exercise and stretching.
original: I'm just doing some exercise and stretching.

key: You are a bit old to learn martial arts but you have many things that can make you a great fighter.
original: You are a bit old to learn martial arts but you have many things that can make you a great fighter.
translation: 对你来说练武有点太晚了，但还有其它办法

key: I can teach you, Muay Thai. My homeland fighting style.
original: I can teach you, Muay Thai. My homeland fighting style.
translation: 我可以教你泰拳，一种我们家乡的拳脚功夫

key: Do you want to be my student?
original: Do you want to be my student?

key: It's boring and takes a lot of time!
original: It's boring and takes a lot of time!

key: But you can fight bad buddies and many girls will fall in love with you.
original: But you can fight bad buddies and many girls will fall in love with you.
translation: 但你可以干翻坏家伙，许多女孩儿都会爱上你的

key: I will teach you for free.
original: I will teach you for free.

key: We are not in an action movie.
original: We are not in an action movie.

key: And I have more important things to do.
original: And I have more important things to do.
translation: 而且我还有其他事要做

key: Okay, you just missed your chance.
original: Okay, you just missed your chance.
translation: 行吧，你可没有第二次机会了

key: It will be kinda pricey if you want to learn something from me.
original: It will be kinda pricey if you want to learn something from me.
translation: 如果你想拜我为师，得付出点代价了
\C[5]玛丽娜\c[0]，带你的小家伙回去吧

key: He turns his face like flipping paper.
original: He turns his face like flipping paper.

key: I thought you didn't want to do boring things.
original: I thought you didn't want to do boring things.
translation: 我还以为你不愿意干这种无聊事

key: You won't get anything from this old man.
original: You won't get anything from this old man.
translation: 我这糟老头什么也给不了你

key: They call me the helper boy.
original: They call me the helper boy.

key: I wouldn't do this every day, tho.
original: I wouldn't do this every day, tho.

key: Little force is better than nothing.
original: Little force is better than nothing.

key: But I won't give you anything for your help.
original: But I won't give you anything for your help.

key: Thanks for your help, little one.
original: Thanks for your help, little one.

key: It's always welcome if you buy woods and stones from me.
original: It's always welcome if you buy woods and stones from me.
translation: 想买木头石头，随时找我

key: Let me help you feed the chickens!
original: Let me help you feed the chickens!

key: Thank you for your help but it kinda ruined my hobby.
original: Thank you for your help but it kinda ruined my hobby.
translation: 谢谢你帮忙，但我更喜欢自己做

key: Can I sit here and watch your training?
original: Can I sit here and watch your training?
translation: 我能做这儿看你训练吗？

key: You are not my student anyway.
original: You are not my student anyway.

key: I shouldn't have refused so quickly.
original: I shouldn't have refused so quickly.
translation: 我真不该拒绝得那么快

key: I don't think you're still sitting here.
original: I don't think you're still sitting here.

key: Thank you for letting me observe.
original: Thank you for letting me observe.

key: I'm about to start my morning training.
original: I'm about to start my morning training.

key: You can stay here and watch,
original: You can stay here and watch,

key: I can't even see his hand.
original: I can't even see his hand.
translation: 我都看不清他手上的动作！

key: This is nothing compared to when I was younger.
original: This is nothing compared to when I was younger.
translation: 我年轻时没人是我的对手

key: I can chop all these logs in one minute.
original: I can chop all these logs in one minute.
translation: 那堆木头我一分钟就能劈完

key: Does material arts training make people that strong?
original: Does material arts training make people that strong?
translation: 武术训练真能让人变那么强壮吗？
现在我有点后悔做那个决定了……

key: You said I come here for the Bee House solutions.
original: You said I come here for the Bee House solutions.
translation: 你说我来要蜂箱的做法

key: We will talk about it later after I've finished all of this.
original: We will talk about it later after I've finished all of this.

key: The most important thing if you want to build anything.
original: The most important thing if you want to build anything.
translation: 如果你想造点什么，工作台必不可缺

key: Go to the desired location and place it.
original: Go to the desired location and place it.

key: How can I make a Bee House "Scroll"?
original: How can I make a Bee House "Scroll"?

translation: 工作台虽然做不了什么

key: Before that you need a Blueprint.
original: Before that you need a Blueprint.
translation: 但有了蓝图就不一样了

key: You can buy it from me, here.
original: You can buy it from me, here.
translation: 你可以从我这儿买蓝图

key: After gathering all the necessary Materials listed in the Blueprint, you can go to your Workbench and use all of those to create a final product.
original: After gathering all the necessary Materials listed in the Blueprint, you can go to your Workbench and use all of those to create a final product.
translation: 准备好蓝图列出的材料后，你可以在工作台上制作成品了

key: The basic materials are Wood, Stone and Nails.
original: The basic materials are Wood, Stone and Nails.
translation: 最基本的材料有木材、石材和钉子

key: I have to go to the forest to chop trees now?
original: I have to go to the forest to chop trees now?
translation: 我现在要去森林里砍树吗？

key: You can only do that if you have a logging license.
original: You can only do that if you have a logging license.
translation: 你要砍树得先有伐木执照才行

key: you can get wood from cutting those.
original: you can get wood from cutting those.

key: Only choose the \c[1]Bluish Stones\c[0], they contains some iron elements which will make the structure more solid.
original: Only choose the \c[1]Bluish Stones\c[0], they contains some iron elements which will make the structure more solid.
translation: 只有那些\c[1]蓝石头\c[0]才行，这种石头里有铁元素，可以让成品更结实

key: You can buy those from me as well but it has a really high price.
original: You can buy those from me as well but it has a really high price.
translation: 你可以从我这儿买，就是有点贵

key: I could build a solid gold house with those materials money.
original: I could build a solid gold house with those materials money.
translation: 有这些钱我都能造座金房子了

key: Then the only way you can go now is to find them by yourself.
original: Then the only way you can go now is to find them by yourself.
translation: 那你只好自己去收集了

key: I'm the only one selling wood and stone in this town.
original: I'm the only one selling wood and stone in this town.
translation: 这里只有我卖木材和石材

key: It will be more fun by doing it yourself, little one.
original: It will be more fun by doing it yourself, little one.
translation: 如果你自己动手的话会更有趣，小家伙

key: Oh! I still have something for you.
original: Oh! I still have something for you.

key: An axe from my great, great grandfather.
original: An axe from my great, great grandfather.
translation: 我曾曾祖父的一把斧头

key: It's in a bad condition and I can't use it anymore.
original: It's in a bad condition and I can't use it anymore.
translation: 现在已经坏得不行了，我用不了

key: Better give it to someone than throw it away.
original: Better give it to someone than throw it away.
translation: 与其扔掉不如送给你吧

key: There's only one blacksmith in town.
original: There's only one blacksmith in town.

key: I have some business with her before.
original: I have some business with her before.

key: You can buy \c[1]Nails\c[0] and \c[1]Hammer\c[0] from her too.
original: You can buy \c[1]Nails\c[0] and \c[1]Hammer\c[0] from her too.
translation: 你可以从她那买\c[1]钉子\c[0]和\c[1]锤子\c[0]
从\C[20]埃克\c[0]老爷子这里买一份\c[1]蓝图\c[0],

key: collect all the \c[1]Necessary Materials\c[0] listed in the blueprint then go to the \c[1]Workingbench\c[0]...
original: collect all the \c[1]Necessary Materials\c[0] listed in the blueprint then go to the \c[1]Workingbench\c[0]...
translation: 收集好所有的\c[1]必须材料\c[0]然后去\c[1]工作台\c[0]……

key: Choose the \c[1]Desired Location\c[0] and place the \c[1]Final Product\c[0].
original: Choose the \c[1]Desired Location\c[0] and place the \c[1]Final Product\c[0].

key: I can get \c[1]Wood\c[0] and \c[1]Stone\c[0] from chopping \c[1]Tree Stumps\c[0] and mashing \c[1]Bluish Rocks\c[0].
original: I can get \c[1]Wood\c[0] and \c[1]Stone\c[0] from chopping \c[1]Tree Stumps\c[0] and mashing \c[1]Bluish Rocks\c[0].
translation: 我能砍\c[1]树桩\c[0]获得\c[1]木材\c[0]，砸\c[1]蓝石头\c[0]获得\c[1]石材\c[0]

key: But first I need to place the \c[1]Workbench\c[0] first.
original: But first I need to place the \c[1]Workbench\c[0] first.
translation: 但首先我得找个地方放\c[1]工作台\c[0]

key: There's a small area near my Planting Spot.
original: There's a small area near my Planting Spot.
translation: 我的小花园附近有片空地

key: You've learned how to build a \c[14]Bee House
original: You've learned how to build a \c[14]Bee House
translation: 你已经学会怎么做一个\c[14]蜂箱\c[0]了

key: \c[21]You can access Quest Logs by 'A' key or through Menu
original: \c[21]You can access Quest Logs by 'A' key or through Menu
translation: \c[21]你可以按'A'键查看任务清单，或从游戏菜单进去看
